MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD5 postcode area of Stichill. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:30pm due to a fault at the Queenscairn transformer and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:50pm on Thursday, 04 March 2021
